questions.question: What is the main reason the Industrial Revolution was able to start in the U.S.?

choices.answer: Smart people moved to the U.S.
Business tycoons took over the government
Business owners being hands off in business
The government beings hands-off in business
The government being very involved in busienss
A railroad traveling across the entire country
A railroad moving north and south
A famous railroad in New York
A famous railroad owned by Rockefellar

questions.question: Rockefellar was known for being a business tycoon of what industry?
Who was the business tycoon over the railroads?
Carnegie was a business tycoon over which industry?
What is the main idea behind the process of horizontal integration?

choices.answer: Buying competing companies to make one big company
Buying all of the means of production to run a company

questions.question: What is the main idea behind the process of vertical integration?

choices.answer: Buying all of the means of production to run a company
Buying competing companies to create a big comapny

questions.question: The term "robber barons" is used to describe the business tycoons.  Why?

choices.answer: They robbed banks to make money
They were known to be selfish and take advantage of the weak
They stole natural resources to make their companies

questions.question: Social Darwinism is the idea that ...

choices.answer: Weaker people should be killed off
Some people/businesses are stronger and better than others

questions.question: What was the purpose of the Sherman Anti-Trust Act?

choices.answer: To assist in the creation of trusts
To outlaw the creation of trusts
To accuse Sherman of being a liar
To arrest all of the business tycoons/robber barons

questions.question: What was the main purpose of the labor movement and unions?

choices.answer: To demand better pay, shorter hours, and safer conditions
To assist business owners in hiring cheap workers
To help in the creation of monopolies and trusts

questions.question: The form of protest where workers walk out and refuse to work is known as a ....
When groups negotiate together for better pay and working conditions, it is known as ...
The cartoon below depicts the octopus grabbing the Capitol Building in order to demonstrate ...

choices.answer: Rockefellar taking over the govt and becoming President
The influence that Big Business had on the government
The dangers of oil to the environment
